settings.title: A good updated website counts in a world that's constantly online

settings.editor: The world is slowly moving towards more online communication. Make sure your business doesn’t fall behind. A few reasons why an updated website is important:

icon_list.text: It looks more professional than your competition
It shows that you take your business serious
It will make the sale a lot easier
